1. Bachelor of Science- Four-year certification in scientific studies (BSc) is a college degree course typically of three years span. It is perhaps the most well-known course decision among Science understudies after Class 12. The full type of BSc is Bachelor of Science (Baccalaureus Scientiae in Latin). The course is considered as an established course for understudies who need to make their vocation in the field of Science. It is offered in an assortment of Science subjects at a greater part of colleges in India. A portion of the famous BSc courses that understudies as a rule decide to seek after Class 12 are BSc Physics, BSc Computer Science, BSc Chemistry, BSc Biology, BSc Mathematics, thus on. A BSc course can be sought after as both a full-time or low maintenance course On account of low maintenance or distance learning programs, the term shifts between four to five years.
  •  BSc Eligibility Criteria:
    The BSc qualification models are as per the following: Competitors should clear Class 12 in the Science stream with at least 50% to 60 percent total from a perceived board. It very well might be noticed that the base rate needed for BSc affirmations might shift contingent upon the approach of the college/school in which a competitor is applying. 

    Competitors probably contemplated Physics, Chemistry and Mathematics (PCM) or Physics, Chemistry and Biology as center subject blends. 

    By and large, there is no age limit for seeking after BSc except if determined by an organization’s qualification models

BA Eligibility criteria

    Applicants ought to have finished their 10+2 from a perceived board.

  1. Bachelors of Engineering-  Bachelor of Engineering is the full type of B.E. which is a four-extended course that contains eight semesters. A B.E. course fundamentally centers around hypothetical information and the designing part of science. Bachelor of Engineering doesn’t zero in on specialized information or application-based investigations. Understudies can seek after some specialization in the designing area. Hopeful understudies have various choices to select their specializations. Students can pursue their Bachelor of Engineering in two ways. Bachelor of Engineering degree comprises eight semesters. Students can either do a B.E. degree in three years after completing their Diploma in Engineering or they can also opt for a four-year-long degree course in B.E. after completing their 10+2 education levels. B.E. degree for four years is more impactful than the diploma in terms of depth and curriculum of the subjects.
  • Eligibility for B.E- Understudies who are seeking to become future designers need to accept science streams. Physical science, Chemistry, and Mathematics (PCM) are the obligatory subjects that understudies ought to have at the hour of their 10+2 sheets. Software engineering, Biology, and Geography are likewise significant subjects for the individuals who decide on Computer Science and Engineering, Biological Engineering, and Geological Engineering. Hopeful understudies who need to take up a Bachelor of Engineering and do a specialization of their decision ought to finish their 10+2 training from a perceived board. Understudies need to score at least 50% imprints in the sheets yet a few colleges additionally require 75% imprints in class twelfth board assessment. Be that as it may, the main standard is to cross the Joint Entrance Examination or other identical assessments.
  1. Bachelor of Commerce- B.Com or Bachelor of Commerce is a three-year college degree program conferred in full-time, distance training just as online mode. B.Com is the most pursued course under the business stream as greatest trade understudies will in general enlist into a B.Com course at the UG level. Going to the decision of UG course under business, understudies have BCom and BCom (Honors) as two choices. Three years of the BCom degree is separated into six semesters with topics including financial accounting, corporate expense, financial matters, organization law, evaluating, business the board, and so on BCom marks as the doorway to a vocation in business, finance, bookkeeping, banking, and protection. Some B.Com understudies likewise think about the course as Plan B while planning for Chartered Accountancy, Cost Accounting, and Company Secretaryship.

Bachelor of Business Administration– Bachelor of Business Administration or BBA is quite possibly the most mainstream and pursued four-year college education programs sought after by understudies after Class 12. The BBA course is the doorway to plenty of open positions in various areas like Marketing, Education, Finance, Sales, and Government to give some examples. BBA is a three-year proficient college class in Business Management. It is available to understudies from every one of the three streams: Science, Arts, and Commerce. The BBA course offers information and preparation in administration and authority abilities to set them up for administrative jobs and business ventures. There are around 4600 BBA universities in India. Understudies who wish to land in the field of the board can seek the BBA course after finishing Class 12. The course will assist the understudies with learning different parts of business organizations and the executives through study hall addresses and reasonable undertakings like temporary positions.
